system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.X1Qj8vIUDMDE4iQ9]{Autofire Proficiency}

Benefits

The character can treat an automatic-only weapon as if it has a semi-automatic rate of fire.

Normal

Automatic weapons can only be used to make burstfire, suppressive fire, and autofire attacks.
system.summary: Treat auto only weapons as SL
